title: Admaius Capital partners with Egyptian medicated-cosmetics firm Parkville
description: Admaius Capital Partners, a private equity investor with a focus on Africa’s growth markets, has today announced a strategic partnership with Parkville Holding Company B.V., a prominent healthcare and wellness firm in Egypt known for its operation in various high-growth sectors. This collaboration will empower Parkville to broaden its regional influence by capitalizing on its […]

title: Nahdet Misr, Akhdar forge partnership to revolutionise digital learning with interactive content
description: Nahdet Misr Publishing has entered into a collaboration with the “Akhdar” application, a leading educational platform known for its audiobook summaries, to create interactive digital educational content for Nahdet Misr’s e-learning platform, Adwaa’. The goal of this partnership is to offer a dynamic and engaging learning experience that enhances students’ comprehension and skill development. As […]

title: Twin stars unveil planet-consuming behaviors
description: Evidence of planetary ingestion found in stellar twins

title: Cybersecurity professionals question value of education amidst skills shortage
description: A new global study by Kaspersky Lab, a leading cybersecurity firm, reveals a growing disconnect between cybersecurity education and the needs of the industry. The research comes as the world faces an acute shortage of cybersecurity professionals. The study found that nearly half (47a%) of cybersecurity professionals surveyed felt their academic training wasn’t very applicable […]

title: Egypt raises fuel prices by 9-22% to align with global market, currency reforms
description: The Egyptian government announced on Thursday an increase in fuel prices by between 9-22%, citing rising global oil prices and the recent liberalization of the Egyptian pound’s exchange rate. The decision, implemented by the Egyptian Petroleum Pricing Committee, reflects adjustments across various fuel types. The price of 80-octane petrol will rise by EGP 1 to […]

title: Facebook Pokes See 13x Surge After Feature Updates
description: Facebook’s playful “poke” feature, a relic of the platform’s early days, is experiencing a surprising resurgence thanks to recent updates. The social media giant reports a 13-fold increase in poking activity over the past month, with a surprising trend – over half of these pokes are coming from younger users aged 18 to 29. This […]

title: Moharram & Partners sign MoU with GAFI to boost investment-friendly policies
description: In a significant move to bolster Egypt’s appeal as a prime investment hub, the General Authority for Investment and Free Zones (GAFI) and Moharram & Partners have inked a three-year cooperation agreement. The signing ceremony featured Hossam Heiba, GAFI’s CEO, and Mostafa Moharram, Chairperson of Moharram & Partners’ Advisory Board. This partnership aims to elevate […]

title: Transport Minister meets Spanish ambassador to discuss progress in joint transport projects
description: Cooperation encompasses management, operation, maintenance, and re-delivery of various terminals within Egyptian ports

title: Egypt’s Trade Minister discusses BSH’s business strategy in local market
description: Ahmed Samir, Egypt’s Minister of Trade and Industry, convened with a delegation from BSH International, the parent company of the Bosch home appliances brand. The meeting, led by Goken Segen, BSH’s Regional Director, centered on the firm’s ongoing and prospective investment and growth initiatives in Egypt. The minister revealed that BSH is in the process […]

title: Saint-Gobain launches construction of third glass factory in Sokhna with €175m investment
description: Waleed Gamal El-Din, Chairperson of the Suez Canal Economic Zone (SCZONE), presided over the groundbreaking ceremony for Saint-Gobain’s third glass production facility. The new factory, covering 200,000 square meters, represents a €175m investment in the region. Concurrently, a solar energy station was inaugurated, designed to generate 10 megawatts of electricity and reduce carbon emissions by […]

title: President Al-Sisi reviews economic indicators, social support initiatives
description: Egypt’s President Abdel Fattah Al-Sisi convened with key government officials, including Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly, Central Bank Governor Hassan Abdullah, and ministers from the Planning, International Cooperation, and Finance departments. The assembly provided President Al-Sisi with an update on the nation’s economic health, spotlighting the outcomes of recent investment strategies, economic revitalization efforts, and initiatives […]
